content.question: Consider the family of functions defined by y = bxebx, where b is a nonzero constant. Show that the absolute minimum value of bxebx is the same for all nonzero values of b.

frqParts.text: Consider the family of functions defined by y = bxebx, where b is a nonzero constant. Show that the absolute minimum value of bxebx is the same for all nonzero values of b.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Apply an appropriate mathematical definition, theorem, or test.
